text: {| |} MV Trisha Kerstin 2 is a ro-ro ferry owned and operated by Aleson Shipping Lines. She the former MV Geiyo, acquired by Aleson Shipping in July 2003. == References == == External links == * * MV Trisha Kerstin 2 Specs - Maritime Connector * MV Trisha Kerstin 2 Specs - Shipsinfo * Transit: Going to Tawi-tawi Category:1989 ships Category:Ships built in Japan Category:Ferries of the Philippines Category:Active ships of the Philippines
title: MV Trisha Kerstin 2
